articles.author: Andy Hayes, news reporter
articles.title: Nestlé to cut almost 600 jobs as it closes UK factory and moves some production to Europe - Sky News
articles.description: The firm says the plant it intends to close in Fawdon is "home to many smaller, low-growth brands", and it will invest elsewhere.

articles.author: Jonathan Keane
articles.title: Europe has 'record-breaking' first quarter for VC deals Just now - Siliconrepublic.com
articles.description: Figures from Pitchbook show investor cash has continued to flow heavily in Europe despite the pandemic, with the UK retaining the top spot.
articles.content:
Figures from Pitchbook show investor cash has continued to flow heavily in Europe despite the pandemic, with the UK retaining the top spot.
